argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumrecl.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumrecl.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | isumrecl.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 4 |  | isumrecl.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 5 |  | isumrecl.5 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 6 | 4 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 6, 5 | #P_isumclim2 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> sum_ k e. Z A ) |
| 8 | 3, 4 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 8 | #P_serfre | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) : Z --> RR ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. Z ) -> ( seq M ( + , F ) ` j ) e. RR ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 7, 10 | #P_climrecl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A e. RR ) |
